item.title: What are the countries in the Europen Union?
What does a leopard gecko eat?
item.description: Insects, such as crickets and mealworms.

item.title: What is fracking?
item.description: Fracking, which is short for “hydraulic fracturing”, is a form of natural gas extraction in which large amounts of fluid are injected underground, into rock that contains natural gas. The pressure from the fluid creates small fractures that allow the gas to release and be reclaimed on the surface.

item.title: What is Parler?
item.description: Parler is a microblogging site, similar in many ways to Twitter, that became popular among right-wing and conservative users when Twitter began to more strongly enforce content and community standards, a process which lead to the removal of content that violated those terms.

item.title: What is socialism?
item.description: Socialism is a form of government in which resources are distributed evenly among the citizens.

item.title: What is the currency of the United States?
What is WAP?
item.description: WAP stands for “Wet Ass Pussy”. It is the name of a hit song from 2020, a collboration between Cardi B and Megan Thee Stallion.
